document.ModsDocTitle: A key to species of the genus Gastroserica Brenske of the China (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Sericini), with the description of two new species and two new records for China
document.docAuthor: Liu, Wan-Gang, Ahrens, Dirk, Bai, Ming & Yang, Xing-Ke
document.masterDocTitle: A key to species of the genus Gastroserica Brenske of the China (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Sericini), with the description of two new species and two new records for China
